description:
Get in the best shape of your life with thousands of free workouts and premium programs that help you achieve your fitness goals. Workout Trainer is a TOP app in the App Store -- download it now for FREE!

Whether you’re lifting weights at the gym or doing bodyweight workouts at home, Skimble’s Workout Trainer will help you get fit with 1000's of free multimedia workouts coached by expert personal trainers. They will guide you through every exercise with timed, step-by-step audio, photo and video instruction -- complete with encouragement! Choose your area of focus like weight loss, yoga, weightlifting, running & more.

Take advantage of these awesome features to help you lose weight, tone up, stay fit and so much more!
• Put on your headphones and follow along to audio instructions and progress cues 
• See instructional photos and videos that explain each move in detail
• Complete our free virtual fitness assessment for a customized experience!
• Create your own workouts: use our multimedia exercise library with instant audio
• Schedule workouts and get reminders on your iPhone & iPad 
• Share your workouts via Email, Facebook and Twitter 
• Play your favorite music while working out 
• Use Shakerciser to instantly get a workout just right for you
• Try new and recommended workouts from the community
• Discover our 15 million member strong community of exercisers like you

Workout Trainer is ideal for people who want to get in shape without using any exercise equipment. Also great for those who enjoy Tabata, High Intensity Interval Training (HIIT), timed workouts, P90X, CrossFit WOD, and the 7-Minute Scientific Workout.

Everything tracked with Skimble's Workout Trainer application is synchronized with the Skimble.com website, so you can connect with the active community that has made Workout Trainer a top free iPhone & iPad app in Healthcare & Fitness!

Workout Trainer can synchronize your calories burned during workouts to the Health app on your device.
releaseNotes:
• Beautiful redesign for iPhone 6 & 6 Plus
• Adaptive workout & program recommendations
• HealthKit integration: share calories burned for your workouts
• New content for home workouts, yoga practice, and much more!
